text: Currently no, but I think the team is thinking about that (<@U03FJQPSC0Y> might be able to tell you more about it), really the one thing you can do is display your crm card in either the overview or custom tab, also they are thinking about allowing for changing the name on the custom tab (don't know if this affects you in any way): <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C04A3FUK8HK/p1677078091693709?thread_ts=1676727561.244409&cid=C04A3FUK8HK>

Hi <@U04L9MBL308> I see that you want to add multiple cards on the same tab (custom or overview), and you can do so today.

It’s not possible to add new tabs or rename existing tabs today. Would you be interested in a related private beta? If yes, please DM me your contact details and I will connect you with the PM.
Could you please inform me what kind of url redirection I use in the public application?

So basically to create a public app you need to setup oauth, here's a tutorial on how to do that: <https://app.HubSpot.com/login/beta/select?loginRedirectUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fapp.HubSpot.com%2Fshortlink%2Facademy%2Ftracks%2F71%2F593%2F2967%3F_ga%3D2.13428671.928551011.1677162638-215608415.1675369037|https://app.HubSpot.com/login/beta/select?loginRedirectUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fapp.HubSpot[…]%3F_ga%3D2.13428671.928551011.1677162638-215608415.1675369037>
Hi <@U03FJQPSC0Y> , We need a future requirement to add multiple tabs on HubSpot CRM card. If you are ok my team want to talk directly with few HubSpot CRM features.
Yes, that’s what I meant, to connect you with the right PM for this. I think I have your e-mail, so I will pass that on, and someone will get in touch with you
Passed your e-mail. They might get in touch with you when they are ready.
